name: Tutorial_Select_Eirika
_source: speak;Anna;Now, I hope you were paying attention to the story!|If you were, you'd know our trusty hero is <red>Eirika</>.|We will be referring her to as our <red>"Lord"</> from now on.|<red>"Lord"</> is the common term used for the main character in Fire Emblem games!|They tend to be royals, so... it tracks.|<red>If your Lord's HP is reduced to 0, you're done for!</>|You will then have to start the chapter over!|You'll want to do your best to keep your Lord alive!|Now, to win, you must complete the goal of each chapter.|In this case, it is to defeat or <red>"Rout"</> all the enemies on the map.;;;;6

speak;Anna;In this version of FE8, if you get unlucky and Eirika dies, there is still hope!|You have a timewheel with 3 charges that you can use!|Though, for this chapter, I'll cut you a deal and give you unlimited charges!|So feel free to use it as much as you like!|Oh, I should explain what it is, shouldn't I?|When you activate your timewheel...|It lets you freely turn back time!|You can go back to any point during the previous turns.|When Eirika dies, it'll activate automatically, too!|So, you can swoop right in, and fix your error!|If Eirika dies while you have no charges, though...|Game over!|However, this IS the prologue.|So, y'know, unlimited charges!|But don't get too spoiled...|It's a good idea to keep Eirika safe regardless!;;;;6
